Eric Schmidt wrote in the Harvard Business Review that all of Google's initiatives for year are mobile-centric. We are at the point where, between the geolocation capability of the phone and the power of the phone's browser platform, it is possible to deliver personalized information about where you are, what you could do there right now, and so forth-- and to deliver such a service at scale.
